text: Xa kuthe kwafumaniseka okokuba aba babini banetyala lesono (sokuxoka phantsi kwesifungo), thabathani amanye (amangqina) amabini endaweni yawo, asondeleyo ngokuzalana (nomfi lowo) kwabo babanga ukuba ilungelo liyimfanelo yabo. (Nabo) mabafunge ngoAllâh (bathi):”Siyangqina okokuba ubungqina bethu bobona buyinyani kunobabo babini, kananjalo asigabadelanga, kuba ngenene singaba singabenzi bobubi”
